mapper.select:
select count(1) value,(select name from sys_org where ORGPKVALUE = t.pertainareaid) name from ( select f.businessid,'formal' ITEM_CODE,'正式评审' type,f.pertainareaid ,f.apply_date applydate from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2
and d.decision_result in (${result})
and d.formal_type = 0) union all select b.businessid,'bulletin' ITEM_CODE, '其他评审' type,b.pertainareaid ,b.applytime applydate from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2
and d.decision_result in (${result})
and d.formal_type = 1) union all select p.businessid,'pre' ITEM_CODE, '投标评审' type,p.pertainareaid ,p.apply_date applydate from rcm_pre_info p where p.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2
and d.decision_result in (${result})
and d.formal_type = 2) ) t where 1 = 1
and t.item_code in (${serviceTypeId})
and t.pertainareaid in (${pertainAreaId})
and t.applydate between to_date('${year}/01/01 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${year}/12/31 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by t.pertainareaid

select ta.item_code value,decode(ta.item_code,'formal','正式评审','bulletin','其他评审','pre','投标评审') name from ( select f.businessid,'formal' ITEM_CODE,'正式评审' type,f.pertainareaid from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,2,3,4) and d.formal_type = 0) union all select b.businessid,'bulletin' ITEM_CODE, '其他评审' type,b.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,2,3,4) and d.formal_type = 1) union all select p.businessid,'pre' ITEM_CODE, '投标评审' type,p.pertainareaid from rcm_pre_info p where p.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,2,3,4) and d.formal_type = 2) ) ta group by ta.item_code

select f.businessid,'formal' ITEM_CODE,'正式评审' type,f.pertainareaid from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,2,3,4) and d.formal_type = 0) union all select b.businessid,'bulletin' ITEM_CODE, '其他评审' type,b.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,2,3,4) and d.formal_type = 1) union all select p.businessid,'pre' ITEM_CODE, '投标评审' type,p.pertainareaid from rcm_pre_info p where p.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,2,3,4) and d.formal_type = 2)

select ta.pertainareaName name,count(1) value from ( select m.*,(select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = m.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from ( select 'formal' ITEM_CODE,'正式评审' type,f.pertainareaid from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,3) and d.formal_type = 0) union all select 'bulletin' ITEM_CODE, '其他评审' type,b.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,3) and d.formal_type = 1) union all select 'pre' ITEM_CODE, '投标评审' type,p.pertainareaid from rcm_pre_info p where p.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,3) and d.formal_type = 2) ) m) ta group by pertainareaName

select ta.pertainareaName name,count(1) value from ( select m.*,(select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = m.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from ( select 'formal' ITEM_CODE,'正式评审' type,f.pertainareaid from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (2,4) and d.formal_type = 0) union all select 'bulletin' ITEM_CODE, '其他评审' type,b.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (2,4) and d.formal_type = 1) union all select 'pre' ITEM_CODE, '投标评审' type,p.pertainareaid from rcm_pre_info p where p.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (2,4) and d.formal_type = 2) ) m) ta group by pertainareaName

select n.type,n.ITEM_CODE ,n.pertainareaName,count(1) num from ( select m.*,(select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = m.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from ( select 'formal' ITEM_CODE,'正式评审' type,f.pertainareaid from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,3) and d.formal_type = 0) union all select 'bulletin' ITEM_CODE, '其他评审' type,b.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,3) and d.formal_type = 1) union all select 'pre' ITEM_CODE, '投标评审' type,p.pertainareaid from rcm_pre_info p where p.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (1,3) and d.formal_type = 2) ) m) n group by (n.pertainareaName,n.type,n.ITEM_CODE) order by type

select n.type,n.ITEM_CODE ,n.pertainareaName,count(1) num from ( select m.*,(select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = m.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from ( select 'formal' ITEM_CODE,'正式评审' type,f.pertainareaid from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (2,4) and d.formal_type = 0) union all select 'bulletin' ITEM_CODE, '其他评审' type,b.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (2,4) and d.formal_type = 1) union all select 'pre' ITEM_CODE, '投标评审' type,p.pertainareaid from rcm_pre_info p where p.businessid in ( select d.formal_id from rcm_decision_resolution d where d.vote_status = 2 and d.decision_result in (2,4) and d.formal_type = 2) ) m) n group by (n.pertainareaName,n.type,n.ITEM_CODE) order by type

select count(1) value ,b.bulletintypeid , (select d.item_name from sys_dictionary_item d where d.uuid =b.bulletintypeid) name from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.stage in ('1.5','2','3')
and b.applytime between to_date('${year}/01/01 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${year}/12/31 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
group by b.bulletintypeid
select * from rcm_v_deptreport_0922 where userid = #{userId} and person_type = '2'
select * from rcm_v_deptreport_0922 where userid = #{userId} and person_type = '1'

select d.*,v.decision_date from rcm_v_deptlist d left join rcm_v_project_info v on v.business_id = d.businessid where d.wf_state != 3 and d.stage in ( ${stage} ) and d.type = #{pType}
and d.legalleaderid in ( ${id} )
and d.reviewleaderid in ( ${id} )
and name like '%${projectName}%'

select sum(count) from ( select count(v.ID) as count from view_project_review v where v.WF_STATE !='0' and v.TYPE = 'preAssessment' union select count(v.ID) as count from view_project_review v where v.TYPE = 'preAssessment' and v.WF_STATE = '0' )
select * from (select g_.*, rownum rn from (select t.* from team t where 1 = 1 and t.type = '1' order by t.ordernum asc) g_) t_
select * from (select g_.*, rownum rn from (select t.* from team t where 1 = 1 and t.type = '2' order by t.ordernum asc) g_) t_

select 'fromName',count(1) from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.stage in ('3','3.5','3.7',3.9,'4','5') union all select 'pre',count(1) from rcm_pre_info p where p.stage in ('3','3.5','3.7','3.9','4','5') union all select 'bulletin',count(1) from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.stage in ('1.5','2','3')

select 'fromName',count(1) from rcm_formalassessment_info f where f.stage in ('6','7','9') union all select 'pre',count(1) from rcm_pre_info p where p.stage in ('6','7','9') union all select 'bulletin',count(1) from rcm_bulletin_info b where b.stage in ('4','5')
select t1.num1+t2.num2 from (select count(*) num1 from rcm_v_deptreport_wxsh) t1, (select count(*) num2 from rcm_v_deptreport_xsh) t2
select count(*) from rcm_v_deptreport_xsh
select count(*) from rcm_v_deptreport_wxsh

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3') and r.servicetype_id ='1401' ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3') and r.servicetype_id ='1402' ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') and r.servicetype_id ='1401' ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') and r.servicetype_id ='1401' ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') and r.servicetype_id ='1402' ) na group by pertainareaName

select t.*,tt.ordernum,tt.team_leader,tt.team_leader_id from ( select r.TEAM_ID,r.TEAM_NAME,SUM(r.FORMAL_GOING) as FORMAL_GOING, SUM(r.FORMAL_DEALED) as FORMAL_DEALED, SUM(r.PRE_GOING) as PRE_GOING, SUM(r.PRE_DEALED) as PRE_DEALED, SUM(r.BULLETIN_GOING) as BULLETIN_GOING, SUM(r.BULLETIN_DEALED) as BULLETIN_DEALED, SUM(r.TOTAL_NUM) as TOTAL from rcm_v_deptreport_0922 r where r.person_type = '1' GROUP BY r.TEAM_NAME,r.TEAM_ID ) t , team tt where t.team_id = tt.uuid order by tt.ordernum

select t.*,tt.ordernum,tt.team_leader,tt.team_leader_id from ( select r.TEAM_ID,r.TEAM_NAME,SUM(r.FORMAL_GOING) as FORMAL_GOING , SUM(r.FORMAL_DEALED) as FORMAL_DEALED, SUM(r.BULLETIN_GOING) as BULLETIN_GOING, SUM(r.BULLETIN_DEALED) as BULLETIN_DEALED, SUM(r.TOTAL_NUM) as TOTAL from rcm_v_deptreport_0922 r where r.person_type = '2' GROUP BY r.TEAM_NAME,r.TEAM_ID ) t , team tt where t.team_id = tt.uuid order by t.TEAM_ID
select * from rcm_v_deptreport_0922 where team_id=#{teamID} and person_type = '1'
select * from rcm_v_deptreport_0922 where team_id=#{teamID} and person_type = '2'

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('6','7','9') and r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('6','7','9') and r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('3','3.5','3.7','3.9','4','5') and r.servicetype_id is not null and r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('3','3.5','3.7','3.9','4','5') and r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by pertainareaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.areaName as name from ( select (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) areaName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by areaName

select COUNT(*) as value,na.areaName as name from ( select (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) areaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by areaName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_formalassessment_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') ) na group by pertainareaName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_pre_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') ) na group by pertainareaName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.serviceName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_formalassessment_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) serviceName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') ) na group by serviceName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.serviceName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_formalassessment_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) serviceName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') ) na group by serviceName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.serviceName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_pre_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) serviceName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('1','2','3','3.5','3.7','4','5') ) na group by serviceName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_formalassessment_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('6','7') ) na group by pertainareaName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_pre_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('6','7','9') ) na group by pertainareaName

select count(*) as value,na.serviceName as name from ( select (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) serviceName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('6','7','9') ) na group by serviceName

select count(*) as value,na.serviceName as name from ( select (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) serviceName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('6','7','9') ) na group by serviceName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.serviceName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_formalassessment_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) serviceName from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.stage in ('6','7','9') ) na group by serviceName

select sum(investmentamount) as value,na.serviceName as name from ( select (select f.investmentamount from rcm_pre_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid)as investmentamount , (select t.item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=r.servicetype_id) serviceName from rcm_pre_info r where r.stage in ('6','7','9') ) na group by serviceName

select areaId, item_code, (select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = xyz.item_code) servicename, sum(num) num from (select areaid, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaid as areaid, na.servicecode as name, count(*) as value from (select r.pertainareaid, r.servicetype_id servicecode from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('3', '3.5', '3.7', '3.9', '4', '5')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaid, servicecode) order by pertainareaid, servicecode) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx) xyz group by areaid, item_code order by areaid, item_code

select areaid,item_code,(select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=xyz.item_code)servicename,sum(num) num from ( select areaid,item_code,decode(name,item_code,value,0) num from (select na.pertainareaid as areaid, na.servicecode as name, count(*) as value from (select r.pertainareaid,r.servicetype_id servicecode
from rcm_pre_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('3', '3.5', '3.7', '3.9','4', '5')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaid,servicecode) order by pertainareaid, servicecode ) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid='52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx ) xyz group by areaid,item_code order by areaid,item_code

select areaname,item_code,(select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = xyz.item_code) servicename,sum(num) num from (select areaname, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaName as areaName, na.servicecode as name, investmentamount as value from (select (select t.item_code from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = r.servicetype_id) servicecode, (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName,
(select f.investmentamount from rcm_formalassessment_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid) investmentamount
from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('1', '2', '3', '3.5', '3.7', '4', '5')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaName, servicecode,investmentamount) order by pertainareaName, servicecode) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx) xyz group by areaname, item_code order by areaname, item_code

select areaname,item_code,(select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = xyz.item_code) servicename,sum(num) num from (select areaname, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaName as areaName, na.servicecode as name, investmentamount as value from (select (select t.item_code from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = r.servicetype_id) servicecode, (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName,
(select f.investmentamount from rcm_pre_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid) investmentamount
from rcm_pre_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('1', '2', '3', '3.5', '3.7', '4', '5')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaName, servicecode,investmentamount) order by pertainareaName, servicecode) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx) xyz group by areaname, item_code order by areaname, item_code

select areaid,item_code, (select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = xyz.item_code) servicename, sum(num) num from (select areaid, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaid as areaid, na.servicecode as name, count(*) as value from (select r.pertainareaid, r.servicetype_id servicecode from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('6', '7', '9')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaid, servicecode) order by pertainareaid, servicecode) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx) xyz group by areaid, item_code order by areaid, item_code

select areaid,item_code,(select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code=xyz.item_code)servicename,sum(num) num from ( select areaid,item_code,decode(name,item_code,value,0) num from (select na.pertainareaid as areaid, na.servicecode as name, count(*) as value from (select r.pertainareaid,r.servicetype_id servicecode from rcm_pre_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('6', '7', '9')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaid,servicecode) order by pertainareaid, servicecode ) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid='52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx ) xyz group by areaid,item_code order by areaid,item_code

select areaname,item_code,(select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = xyz.item_code) servicename,sum(num) num from (select areaname, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaName as areaName, na.servicecode as name, investmentamount as value from (select (select t.item_code from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = r.servicetype_id) servicecode, (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName,
(select f.investmentamount from rcm_formalassessment_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid) investmentamount
from rcm_formalassessment_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('6', '7', '9')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaName, servicecode,investmentamount) order by pertainareaName, servicecode) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx) xyz group by areaname, item_code order by areaname, item_code

select areaname,item_code,(select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = xyz.item_code) servicename,sum(num) num from (select areaname, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaName as areaName, na.servicecode as name, investmentamount as value from (select (select t.item_code from sys_dictionary_item t where t.item_code = r.servicetype_id) servicecode, (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE = r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName,
(select f.investmentamount from rcm_pre_report f where f.businessid= r.businessid) investmentamount
from rcm_pre_info r where r.servicetype_id not like '%,%' and r.stage in ('6', '7', '9')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaName, servicecode,investmentamount) order by pertainareaName, servicecode) gg, (select item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '52573fc1a3ae4fd78fd2a1c66cee30a1') xx) xyz group by areaname, item_code order by areaname, item_code

select areaId, item_code, (select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.uuid = xyz.item_code) servicename, sum(num) num from (select areaId, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaid as areaId, na.servicecode as name, count(*) as value from (select r.bulletintypeid servicecode, r.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info r where r.stage in ('2', '3','1.5')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaid, servicecode) order by pertainareaid, servicecode) gg, (select uuid item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '730a6d7456f24023990b9812563aad6b') xx) xyz group by areaId, item_code order by areaId, item_code

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_bulletin_info r where r.stage in ('2', '3','1.5') order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by pertainareaName

select areaid, item_code, (select item_name from sys_dictionary_item t where t.uuid = xyz.item_code) servicename, sum(num) num from (select areaid, item_code, decode(name, item_code, value, 0) num from (select na.pertainareaid as areaid, na.servicecode as name, count(*) as value from (select r.bulletintypeid servicecode, r.pertainareaid from rcm_bulletin_info r where r.stage in ('4', '5')) na where na.servicecode is not null group by (pertainareaid, servicecode) order by pertainareaid, servicecode) gg, (select uuid item_code from sys_dictionary_item i where i.fk_dictionary_uuid = '730a6d7456f24023990b9812563aad6b') xx) xyz group by areaid, item_code order by areaid, item_code

select COUNT(*) as value,na.pertainareaName as name from ( select (select t.name from sys_org t where t.ORGPKVALUE=r.pertainareaid) pertainareaName from rcm_bulletin_info r where r.stage in ('4','5') order by r.pertainareaid ) na group by pertainareaName
